column5: NEW KID ON THE GRID....newly renovated. River cabin on the Colorado River situated in Matagorda Island next to the River Bend Public Boat Ramp. New flooring, paint, fixtures & appliances. Tastefully furnished. Kitchen is well stocked for all your cooking needs. New propane grill on the deck. LOTS of parking for boat/trailer/camper. Two minute walk to bar & restaurant!!! Beach is 3 miles away. HUGE deck.
